trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event to customize the conversion of a cell value into a format suitable for display or to customize the appearance of a cell depending on its state or value.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento para personalizar a conversão de um valor de célula para um formato adequado para apresentar ou personalizar o aspeto de uma célula, consoante o respetivo estado ou de valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>eventos ocorre sempre que cada célula é pintada, pelo que deve evitar processamento quando este evento de processamento demorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre também quando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>é obtido ou respetivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é inicializada com o valor da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se fornecer personalizado conversão do valor de célula para o valor de apresentação, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o valor convertida, garantindo que o novo valor é do tipo especificado pela célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar que não é necessário nenhum valor adicional de formatação, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o processador de eventos for concluído, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `null` ou não é do tipo correto, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>está formatado utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Propriedades de estilo de célula devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o que é inicializada utilizando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: Independentemente do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, as propriedades de visualização do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade são utilizados para composição da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de formatação personalizado o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>eventos, consulte [como: personalizar dados formatação no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar penalidades no desempenho quando processar este evento, aceda a célula através dos parâmetros do processador de eventos, em vez de aceder diretamente à célula.

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a conversão de um valor de formato, o utilizador especificado no valor de uma célula real, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `desiredType` parameter represents the type that the `value` parameter should be converted to, and `desiredType` is assigned the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `desiredType` parâmetro representa o tipo que o `value` parâmetro deve ser convertido, e `desiredType` está atribuído a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cell is formatting picture names as bitmaps, `value` is the <xref:System.String> that contains the picture name, and `desiredType` is a <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma célula é formatação nomes de imagem em como os mapas de bits, `value` é o <xref:System.String>que contém o nome de imagem, e `desiredType` é um <xref:System.Type>que representa o <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>tipo.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to a type that can be displayed by the cell, the cell contents will be formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>não definir o processador de eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>propriedade para um tipo que pode ser apresentado pela célula, a célula conteúdo será formatado utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula que causou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que causou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert `value` to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de converter `value` para.

trans-unit.source: The style of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: O estilo da célula que causou o evento.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 -or- rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé inferior a -1 - ou - rowIndex é inferior a -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da célula que está a ser formatado.

trans-unit.source: Setting the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property will change how the cell and its contents are displayed.
trans-unit.target: A definição das propriedades do objeto devolvido pela propriedade CellStyle alterar a forma como é apresentado na célula e o respetivo conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties, use this property to change the cell styles rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar penalidades no desempenho, utilize esta propriedade para alterar os estilos de célula em vez de aceder diretamente à célula.

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os estilos de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the display style of the cell being formatted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo de apresentação da célula a ser formatado.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o valor da célula da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de coluna da célula que está a ser formatado.

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade ColumnIndex para obter um índice para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula que está a ser formatado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell value has been successfully formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o valor de célula foi formatado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, set the FormattingApplied property to `true` after setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property if no further value formatting is required.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento, defina a propriedade de FormattingApplied como `true` após a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>propriedade não se é necessário nenhum valor adicional de formatação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If the FormattingApplied property value is `false` when the event handler exits, the formatting will be applied to the value as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade FormattingApplied `false` quando sai o processador de eventos, a formatação será aplicada ao valor conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objecto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the formatting for the cell value has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a formatação para o valor de célula foi processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de linha da célula que está a ser formatado.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade RowIndex para obter um índice para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está a ser formatado.
